scripts.create:migrate:seeder: sequelize-cli db:create --env development && sequelize-cli db:migrate --env development && sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env development
scripts.undo:create:migrate:seeder: sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --env development && sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --env development && sequelize-cli db:drop --env development
scripts.redo:Migrate: sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --env development && sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --env development && sequelize-cli db:migrate --env development && sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env development
scripts.seed:dev: cross-env SEED_ENV=development SEED_FORCE=true node -r dotenv/config scripts/seed.js
scripts.seed:test: cross-env SEED_ENV=test SEED_FORCE=true node -r dotenv/config scripts/seed.js
